website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a well-made grill that's designed for performance and convenience, you'd have a hard time finding a better option than this gas model by Weber.
pros: A top-seller by a trusted brand with impressive features and capabilities that include spacious grill surface with reversible plates, reliable ignition, warming rack, and plenty of storage
It also looks good and has a solid build
cons: Some owners gripe about rust developing over time
Rare issues with the fuel gauge noted

website_summaries.verdict: If you want a Weber grill that offers the brand's quality build with a price that's suitable for limited budgets, this revamped model is an excellent choice.
pros: An updated version of the popular Spirit series that offers state-of-the-art components, including the Infinity ignition system that's known for reliable starts
Features a larger grilling space than previous models
cons: Awkward to move – some owners with it had 4 wheels instead of 2

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Rust on lid and purchased 5/10/2018 Our old one Weber never rusted that we had for 17 yrs Well Weber is cutting cost, not using Stainless steel on the lid what you don’t know because it’s painted different colors Then passing on the headache to the consumer now I’m working with Weber to resolve my issues. The only answer I have now from Weber is not cover the grill then it won’t rust. That’s not the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Does not include free assembly like listed
customer_reviews.text: Did not include free assembly as described they are trying to charge me an additional fee. Item not as described
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Hands down...best grill.
customer_reviews.text: Weber is amazing. What else can I say. I have used Weber kettle grills and propane grills and never had to throw one away. I re-sell them. They last forever. My new Spirit II E-310 is beautiful. Looks great and works flawlessly. Had to call customer service for a minor problem and they were the best. Sent me a replacement part in less than 24 hours. You might pay a little more for a Weber but it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, suspect QC...
customer_reviews.text: Weber makes fantastic products, of that there can be no doubt. But putting this thing together left me with a lot of questions about their quality control. Even though it appeared to be packaged well, the cookbox is all scuffed and scratched, a piece was broken off, and a good amount of the sheet metal was bent. The front control area also has a good amount of weird, swirly lines. I hope this isn't an indication of how long it will last us.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Weber going cheap
customer_reviews.text: Can't slow cook with this. One burner on low the grill is still 350 degrees, luckily I have a smoker for slow cooking but would like the option on the grill. I have an old 12 year old Weber grill that is falling apart and is ugly and rusted out on bottombut still works great. May just try to refurbish the old grill and sell my new one. The new one appears to be cheaply made, unfortunately like most companies Weber is going for cheap items to get more business....planned obsolescence....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and damaged pieces
customer_reviews.text: The lid had a big piece busted off it. A lot of pieces were bent and I had to pound out with a hammer to put together. Very disappointed for how much this grill costs.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged grill
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and the first piece I took out of the box was damaged. Amazon put me in touch with Weber and they were going to send a new part 2 weeks ago. Just called to follow up and the part was never sent out by Weber. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Marchica

customer_reviews.title: The overall design of the grill needs some improvement. ...
customer_reviews.text: The overall design of the grill needs some improvement. The unit is very difficult to move due to the design of the collapsible tray on the left side.
customer_reviews.author: TeA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together; better than the old Spirit 320
customer_reviews.text: My last gas grill was a Weber Spirit 320 (not to be confused with the Spirit II series). I had it for 14 years and it worked well with the exception of the piezoelectric starter; when the temperature dropped a lot or if it rained, the starter wouldn't work and I'd have to take a small blowtorch to the burners. The Spirit II 315 has an electric start (AA battery) that has started on the first zap every time. The other thing that I really like is that the three burners are laid from front to back instead of side-to-side. It makes it easier create temperature zones on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: mkegaffer

customer_reviews.title: There are better choices.
customer_reviews.text: Controlling heat is impossible below 400 degrees. Instructions have been interpreted in China, from Chinese to English. Lost a lot in the translation. Quality control is non-existent. The Weber logo is out of level, and smeared with left over glue. Paid nearly $500.00 there are lots better units for much less. I wanted the Weber... I am now sorry for this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Farrell

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed in Weber
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this *might* be a great grill, but apparently I'll never know. I had an issue with assembly so I reached out to Weber customer service. I immediately got a standard "We received your email. Here's your request number..." email back. I waited three weeks. Nothing. Ok, there's a world-wide pandemic. They're probably short-staffed. I'll try again. Nothing. Amazon offered to refund or replace, but there's no way in hell I'm going to disassemble this beast (it's 90 percent assembled) and try to box it back up to ship back. Gosh darn it I'm pissed off.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Gestwicki

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to pay a little extra!
customer_reviews.text: Just got grill, and while I've only used it once I'm pleased with the purchase. Assembly is a little time consuming by yourself, but not complicated. Explicit instructions, however the bolts and other pieces were not appropriately labeled. Not hard to figure it out but still should match the assembly guide. Seems to be sturdy and built for long term use. It also comes with a tank scale that tells you how full the tank is which is super helpful. Overall I think this is a good product and my ribs came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ambuler

customer_reviews.title: As usual another great weber product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the grill is great. We grill 4 to 7 times a week and the grill is great. My only complaint is the grease tray. It is somewhat hidden and needs to be remove to be checked. It hung up a little and I sloshed some grease on the deck. Now that I'm aware of the issue I'll be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: M Woz

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, second one works great
customer_reviews.text: Pieces broken, parts dented, screws missing. Not impressed opening my first box. UPDATE: After fighting back and forth with customer support had a whole new grill sent and had to set that up. It works great and has made some of the best steaks I've had. Still loses a star for quality control and the whole annoyance of the affair.
customer_reviews.author: Imaeya

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: First night BBQ was perfect. Happy new Weber owners of a BBQ with an amazing warranty. Big difference (day and night from our last BBQ that was a “bargain”) just out of the box. Even the warming rack is impressive, the weight (quality) and placement (well secured). Looking forward to entertaining, it is remarkable how much cooking space this model, Spirit II 310.
customer_reviews.author: Oligodendroglioma Fund

customer_reviews.title: Great product, extremely difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. Have to disagree with reviews that said its heat is too low. It works perfectly and you can control the heat very well. The only downside is it comes disassembled to a screw. Expect to unbox it for a LONG time and assemble even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have to close the lid and run two burners just to get it hot enough to sear meat, I bought the grill because of the good reviews but i’m highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mark k kackstetter

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: I’m 61 years old and have put a few grills together in my time and with the Weber app provided it was a cinch. The nuts are welded in place so no awkward reaching. Less than 2 hours to assemble, listening to my classic rock (need to listen to music in the garage) lol. The grill really cooks nicely and evenly. I got the iGrill 3 accessory and it’s nice if you roast on your grill. This is my 2nd Weber. My first lasted 13 years and I loved it. This one is even nicer. I highly recommend a cover of you leave it outside all winter like I do. I’m definitely a Weber guy 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Maestrofink

customer_reviews.title: Great grill but w an issue and NO Support
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review - Weber customer care sucks. Amazon does not provide parts replacement and We spent over 3 hours of waiting on the phone to reach someone in customer care in the past week. No success. We email them and tried Instagram, Twitter as way of reaching out. Weber is a pretty expensive grill that should not present such defect in the first place, once it did, I would expect Customer Care to be more effective. Grill cooks well however with the 3rd time of usage the pressure regulator starts to leak pretty bad. Bummer because we were really ready to enjoy our summer grill out!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: A House Warming Gift to my son-in-law
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loves his new Weber grill and uses it every week since we bought it for him. He has forgotten to invite me over for grilled steak, but I am OK with that. As I am not using it, I can only say that besides being thrilled to get a Weber grill, my son-in-law has had nothing but praise for this grill. I love the front to back burners allowing one side of the grill to be an indirect heat for cooking. My old Weber was side to side burners and I rarely used an indirect heat as it seemed to be ineffective. Would I buy this again, at a moments notice YES.
customer_reviews.author: RStauffer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gas grill!
customer_reviews.text: Made the first jump from a charcoal grill to gas grill. So much more convenient to BBQ anytime now! Easy to cook with even heat distribution. Clean up is easy. I use this grill to make dinner about 2-3x/week. About once a month, I empty the drip pan and wipe down everything in the fire box. The fuel gauge level is semi accurate, based on weight of the gas tank. Don't expect much from it. Got it with free Amazon install services, who they partner with 3rd party. My installer was super nice and professional. Done in less than an hour and did test light with me before leaving. Great buy and I could probably use year round!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Main frame bent beyond repair in shipping - unable to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great grill; unfortunately, the main frame was bent during shipment due to inadequate packaging. Unable to assemble because of this. Contacted Amazon customer service to request a replacement part and they recommended I contact Weber. Seriously!? Ended up returning and followed the advice others have given in their feedback and purchased one locally. I am a staunch Amazon customer (I even carry Amazon stock in my investment portfolio), but this was an Amazon fail!
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s working well and the heat distribution is good. Food on the far right side took slightly longer, but not by much. It is notable that the quality is lower than what I would expect from Weber. Also, it’s not too important but all the images show a big black “iGrill Ready” cap on the right shelf but the one I received is a grey cap with a sticker and smaller lettering. Otherwise, it looks just how I expected. RIP the old craftsmanship and open/close doors
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T GET HOT ENOUGH! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, this is a TERRIBLE grill. HUGE disappointment from Weber. My building had the weber genesis ii, so I figured I'd buy a similar one for my house after I moved out. The fire is SO weak it taste like I oven cooked my food. Everything I grill on this taste like garbage. DO NOT BUY. I'm sorry Weber, but you guys should be ashamed of yourselves and discontinue this model. It ruins your reputation. I am in middle of eating my food and decided to write this review in middle of doing so because of how mad and disappointed I am with the way it cooks my food. I would give it 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE my new Weber!
customer_reviews.text: I had a two burner for 10+ years. Felt it was time to upgrade... which I did and got a THREE burner model. I love it! I purchased and put together in March ... I think I've used it at least one time or more every week since completing the unpacking! Directions were easy to follow. I'm guessing a little over an hour to have it ready to go. Can not say enough good things about Weber and their grills. FIVE STAR amazon item... ALL. THE. WAY.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: It's a Weber - the quality you expect!
customer_reviews.text: This grill replaced a previous Weber that lasted 18 years, and I hope to get the same lifespan from this one. Temperature control is good, and the electric start is nice, although I've had to replace the battery more often than I would have expected. I had to get a little creative mounting my old rotisserie system on the new grill, but it works just fine. The only problem I've had was the grill cover handle arrived broken. A quick call to Weber along with a picture of the break, and a replacement was sent out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Holds Heat in the Back
customer_reviews.text: Unlike cheaper grills with a lot of venting in the rear, this Weber actually holds heat so you can cook indirectly properly. We've really been impressed with this, and Amazon really stepped up when we had a slight bit of shipping damage that I was able to resolve through Weber. The cooking surface is a bit small for our family of 4, but I tend to cook more than many at one time. Still a great grill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LWaloski

customer_reviews.title: The paint on the grill bars chipped off after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the grill bars chipped off after 2 months of use (about once a week). The grill does heat up fast which is good. I had to buy new set of stainless steal grill bars. For a $500 grill, the quality of the grill bars is ridiculous. I would consider buying something with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Wooo woo
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to put together and easy to use! This took us about an hour to assemble (we are fairly handy, but the directions went step by step with easy to follow pictures and clearly labeled bags for the screws and bolts).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Muth

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased a gift for one of our sons. He loves it and uses it all the time. The only caveat...it took 2 of them a bit longer to assemble than was stated. They chose to use an on-line Weber tutorial to assemble the grill.
customer_reviews.author: njgram

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, outstanding engineering!
customer_reviews.text: Great grill for the two of us! Had outstanding ratings on Consumers Report. Well designed, well engineered! Sturdy, well built gas grill. Ordered it not assembled as a covid-19 stay at home project. At 67 years old, it took me longer than the 1.30 assembly time. Worked on it pnwarm days in the garage. Was VERY impressed on the engineering and design! Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Ohio

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, we had to put it together, but the instructions were very good. My husband says it is "sweet!" and easy to use. The only thing wrong with it was the warmer (elevated grill thing) seems not to fit. But we don't use that anyway. Overall we would highly recommend this product. Actually, we figured out the "warmer" on the grill, so all is perfect with this item. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A box full of twisted metal
customer_reviews.text: Amazon installer found multiple bent/twisted components when unit was unpacked. The box showed no damage. Now I have to haul this twisted metal to the UPS Store?
customer_reviews.author: markstew

customer_reviews.title: Beware- It could catch on fire !
customer_reviews.text: Grill was defective and caught on fire. Weber customer service wanted me to take all kinds of pictures and basically do an investigation and get back with them. It could have badly injured me or worse and I never even got a “sorry about that” from Weber. Horrible customer service.!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent weber grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Easy instructions to follow when putting together. It's the king of BBQs in my book. Did a pork roast for its first outing. Temperature was easy to keep at the required heat for a 4 hour period. The pork roast was excellent. Very pleased with this purchase. Well worth paying the extra money for a weber grill which I am sure will last a long time. It has pride of place on my patio
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Vatinelle

customer_reviews.title: Best grill I have had.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of Weber is superior to Charbroil. Don't sweat the extra money. Totally worth it and they back it up with a nice warranty. Grill cooks perfectly. Heats up fast and great heat distribution. The instructions are very clear for assembly. Highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, but..
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great, with the following caveat. This is about my 5th Weber, and my first that doesn't have an enclosure with doors for the propane tank and other parts. After using it twice, raccoons climbed under the grill cover and stole the aluminum foil drip pan to lick the steak drippings. I woke up and found the pan in the middle of my backyard. So, we will see if this continues, but would make me think twice about buying this again
customer_reviews.author: BostonJack

customer_reviews.text: Great Grill, it took me a while to purchased this grill finally I ordered from Amazon everything was okay until I opened the box and I found it the Lid was dented ,good thing was when I called Weber customer service they ware amazing ,they replaced the lid right away . one thing I'll say about this grill , the box is heavy and one Ups guy is not enough to bring this unit to the door .
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Ever Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is hands down the best grill we have ever owned! It is very well constructed and has a great intelligent and attractive design. We really like the design of the grill plates and the grease catching system. The grill was easy to assemble and it is a perfect size for my husband and I and when we entertain guests. The burgers, ribs and veggies that we have grilled have been delicious! This should be your next grill!
customer_reviews.author: 1SandrainSF

customer_reviews.title: Super fast heat times, outsanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Great item, received in a very well protected packaging. I do note that some reviews list this as taking a couple of hours to put together, - they are not wrong, but the simplicity of assembly and clearness of the pictorial instructions means that it was much less frustrating that assembling Ikea furniture. So two hours yes, but it is a bad two hours. Well worth it for the quality of the product; heat times are SO fast I almost couldn't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with this grill. The materials feel quality and it performs well with easy ignition, good heat distribution and holds temperature well. Designed ready for iGrill3 is also great (I purchased it separately and have been impressed with it as well). I feel that in this price point, it's a great standard grill that offers quality and versatility. Also very aesthetically pleasing. The open cart design and exposed tank setup give a sense of space that I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: acreative

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting grill together and trying out for the first time. Assembly took 2 hours or so. Instructions are very detailed and easy to follow, with pictures of how NOT to assemble, along with pictures of correct assembly. On prior grill purchases (other brands), I ended up having to redo some steps due to unclear instructions. Grill gets good and hot, and heat is easy to control. Grill has attractive appearance. Highly recommend. Instructions recommend team lift on the box, but box can be moved by one person where needed with a hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: VGER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality medium size BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I've assembled 3 BBQs and this was by far the simplest assembly I have done so far. The instructions were very good, the pieces were very well packed and protected. Apparently there is also an app to aid in assembly, but I didn't even download it. Took me 1 1\2 hours to assemble (with my husband as my assistant) and that is without rushing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed my product immensely. Assembly was time intensive, however the instructions were very clear. There was a dent on my lid upon arrival and after contacting Weber, customer service immediately replaced the part. I was extremely satisfied with the response of customer service and happy to have had my damaged part replaced, especially at this price point. My grilling this summer has been superb! It is efficient and makes great food.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon Purchase & Installation
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about the free installation because of reviews but we got Alexander from Services GHS installation and he finished in under 1 hour. Extremely professional and super easy appointment confirmation!! The grill looks very nice, I was all for the tank gauge which is super cool and handy. Heats up in a jiffy, have yet to try some grilling but looks good so far!
customer_reviews.author: G+D Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality side table, cooks well, electronic ignition works less than 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Weber was awesome. Started the first time, every time. So far I am 3-8 on attempts to have electronic ignition of the grill. I hopeful that their is an easy fix but in reviewing the assembly guide and the assembly 3D app, I haven’t figured it out yet. Additionally the side table is very flimsy and somehow, it is broken already.
customer_reviews.author: GregD

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was rough I won’t lie. Took us about 5 hours but that could’ve been partly due to the margaritas we consumed while putting it together lol. We love the grill tho! We use it about every other day!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Deformed in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Main cart strut was deformed in shipping. Have been on a call waiting for support for 5times the “estimated wait time of 8 minutes.” Overall, the shipping weight and poor design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corosion resistance poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This grill is outdoor ,but in less than one month ,even if are at 1/2 mile from the sea is full of little pop of corrosion... I bought another unit the same day,smaller,in the same area (300 ft) from this location and this one has no corrosion at all...
customer_reviews.author: de blegiers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I've ever had. Definitely worth spending a little extra for. The durability is amazing. It does take a few uses to get the temperature control down. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: You have to figure it out for yourself the picture instructions are pretty much worthless I still haven’t figured out how to install the warming rack
customer_reviews.author: grover c walls

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This grill bowl is intelligently designed, it truly protests the burners and feed line from drippings and the drippings drain well to the collector. Having said that the lower shelf is a perfect size for a Rubbermaid bin to use as a dripping catcher that can be emptied and washed easily versus those little foil tray liners. Also love the reversible grill plates, makes cooking fish easier.
customer_reviews.author: steven ray smith

customer_reviews.title: I repent
customer_reviews.text: I take back my two-star rating where I said it would not heat higher than 430 degrees. That was on account of me being a dumb s__t and putting the burner controls on the low setting. The first setting away from "off" position (at 9:00 position) is the high setting and it gets lower as you turn more. (It doesn't intuitively go from off to low to high.) With all burners up high it does get up to 600+ degrees (gauge pegs out at 600). With all 3 burners on low it was at 425, so if you want lower temps than that you'll need to turn off a burner or two. Now I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It's a good grill
customer_reviews.text: This was the first grill I have ever assembled. It took me an hour, but that included chasing twin 2 year olds around. I read the instructions first, then laid out all the parts in my driveway and got to work. It was very easy. It's a Weber, and performs like a Weber. It can easily cook 8 hamburgers at one time, holds temp well, I LOVE the fact that the LP tank is off to the side and not UNDER the heat source!! Great grill for the average hot dog, hamburger, steak, pork chop consumers
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: The free assembly made a difference
customer_reviews.text: The grill is new and it works great, like most new grills do. I will update this review as the grill get older. The main reason I got this grill on Amazon is because it had the option for free delivery and assembly. The folks who delivered and put it together were great. They did a great job and tested the grill before leaving. That's outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Pagani

customer_reviews.title: Not for grandma to put together but i like that
customer_reviews.text: Impressively packaged to prevent damage. Will require some extra assembly time but that's not a negative for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering through Amazon but local stores were out of stock. Amazon/fedex got the grill to me in good condition in just two days. As others noted, there were a few parts with minor scratches in the finish, nothing major/to bare metal or worth attempting to box it back up. Assembly took right at an hour and is best done on an open surface so you don't have to keep turning the thing around. Grill looks great and hopefully lives up to the Weber hype.
customer_reviews.author: Miah

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!  Well made, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: While many of the reviews said that it takes a long time to assemble, I found that it took about an hour. That being said, I did watch videos on YouTube that really helped me understand the parts and pieces - and there are a LOT of parts. The grill REALLY heats up nicely, evenly, and quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Brickfan

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot enough unless lid closed.
customer_reviews.text: This grill can barely cook a zucchini, let alone steak, without closing the lid. This is not the way a steak or burger should be cooked. It ruins them. And as soon as the lid is lifted, all the heat dissipates lickity split. This grill is a great disappointment, and I'm shocked that Amazon recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: David Bruck

customer_reviews.title: OH WEBER!
customer_reviews.text: My first Weber and I’m so happy with the performance so far! The ease of use, quality of cooking food, taste of food and the accessories are top notch. The optional grilling basket is great for veggies and small pieces of meat. Can’t wait to purchase the griddle for breakfasts! Thank you Weber!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Himes

customer_reviews.title: Good solid grill
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill and use it often. It's a little unfortunate that the temp controls work from front to back and not left to right. It would make cooking a bit easier. Also, we wasted some fuel because the control knobs DO NOT need to be pushed in to turn on, so if you brush past it, you could accidentally turn the gas on. We now always turn the tank valve off after each use.
customer_reviews.author: bridad57

customer_reviews.title: Weber
customer_reviews.text: I have used Weber for years and still have one that I purchased over 20 years ago. We are snow birds and I needed another one at our new home. I don't like buying new grilles ever 5 years and wanted one that would last a life time and as long as I clean it after use. It will look like new for a very long time. Everyone that has seen my over 20 year old Weber can't believe that it is that old. Only the cover is starting to show age like me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two
customer_reviews.text: We have a family cottage on the coast of Maine. Every two years the basic $200 grills rust and fall apart so we buy a new one. I'm trying a Weber with their 10 year warranty. It went together pretty easily but the cooking is what is so awesome. Steaks and burgers were amazing, seared and no flame ups. I liked it so much that I bought one for our home too!
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Glad to finally have a Weber.
customer_reviews.text: I just built this grill today and the quality is superb. Took about an hour with a screwdriver and wrench but I love the end result. I just replaced my 8 year old Brinkmann that started rusting 7 years ago, so I'm very happy with buying not only a new grill, but a quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It’s reliable
customer_reviews.text: The service to have a pro come to my home to assemble the grill was excellent. The grill performs as expected. No complaints. I bought the after market I grill Bluetooth thermometer and it really works. Although knowing the temp doesn’t tell me when to flip the meat so both sides cook evenly.
customer_reviews.author: frequent amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good. Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Have used this grill 25+ times now. Grills with no problems. I have grilled veggies, steak, burgers, sausage, ribs, etc. all came out great. Do yourself a favor and invest in a small smoker box to use with this Grill for that added smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: OriginalCrafty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. We have cooked burgers, hot dogs and chicken so far. It is so quick and easy to operate. Heats up very quickly and everything is delicious. This grill was the #1 pick in Cooks Country magazine. Amazon included a professional to come to our home and put the grill together for us. Looked pretty easy and straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Quality is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I have ever owned. Only thing I didn't like is the tornado that nearly destroyed my Condo on Easter Sunday took it and we cant find it??
customer_reviews.author: dmullins7501

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble/customer care worthless
customer_reviews.text: Got this shipped to me as a birthday gift. Ive had it for almost a week now and cannot assemble it because the inside of the main cooker compartment is jammed packed with parts and wont open. Weber customer care is worthless and won't respond even after I sent them multiple pictures of the grill. They swear a locking pin is keeping it closed and I keep telling them there are no pins and anything I do to open it could break the grill. If there is no response in a few days I'll be sending it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: ATXbrew

customer_reviews.title: Weber's Quality still shines
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, controls are sturdy, easy to control temperature and clean-up is simple. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: eva maynard

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: We received our grill damaged ... the leg on this was bent ...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Klassen

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 Weber Genesis grills -- the Spirit is a better product. It keeps the temperature exactly at the desired temp. It appears to be more fuel efficient than the 3-burner Genesis.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love this Grill
customer_reviews.text: I put this grill together myself and it was very easy with minimum skill required. I then used it the same day and made some burgers that was the best I have ever made.......ever. It cooked the meat evenly did not burn but definitely left the grill marks, I was impressed. Next day I cooked ribeye's, decently priced meat, same results. The only issue I have/had was the size, I was actually going to purchase a larger model, but for pricing and the fact that I am single and do not have a family to cook for, this was the perfect choice. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Best guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the weight of the unit. Seems light. Comes with a bumper to bumper long warranty so it should be great. Haven't fired it up so I can't review. Assembly was included in the price. So again can't review. Looked pretty easy for me,but I'm handy
customer_reviews.author: Barry Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell you how the grill works because no one ever came to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this grill! We've used it almost every night since getting it a few weeks ago. It works perfectly and heats up very fast! The first time we used it, the directions said to run it on high heat for 20 minutes before first use. We did this and it got to almost 600 degrees in that time! I was impressed. Not that I would cook anything that high, but that it gets hot enough for grilling very quickly is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: seadolphin

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations:
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, packaging was in good condition, the product was in good condition and appeared to be as described, and after use met expectations for fit, form, and function.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to build, cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I built it myself without help, took me less than 2 hours. Instructions were very easy and there was lots of support online and on the Weber app. The finished product is sturdy and it feels like high quality. Cooks food evenly and so far, we're very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TNTHE

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for family meals
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Weber grills. I made the mistake of buying a cheap grill last summer after my 10 year old Weber just couldn't move one more time. Never again. Weber is the best! The cooking surface is plenty big to cook for a family of 6 (I only do main course).
customer_reviews.author: kwirki1

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an older grill that was about dead.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice grill. We put it at our lake house for use when we are there. I normally use a smoker/grill at my house and while it does not compete with that it is a very nice useful grill for the weekends. Simple to put together and cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hegerty

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best grill (under $500) on the market. Very happy with this grill, and I actually enjoyed putting it together, too. Not too hard to assemble, and I don’t consider myself the most handy person either. Product arrived in perfect condition. I highly recommend this grill!
customer_reviews.author: TCFENHOLT

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great grill for the price. Instructions are on par with LEGO instructions and even include pictures of what not to do. Took about 60-90 minutes to put together, but the process was very smooth. As far as cooking, the grill cooks evenly and heats up very quickly. Terrific grill.
customer_reviews.author: mrpar54

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Wb grill. The first one I had for 15 years. I purchased this one through Amazon who provided a service technician to assemble it. It’s worth the extra money to buy a quality weber grill. They last forever. Or at least 15 years:(
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kleven

customer_reviews.title: Great looking grill - have a few hours for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the grill yet, but I’m sure it works just fine. Will update the review after using, but what I can say right away is clear your afternoon schedule for putting this thing together. Took me 2 hrs putting it together myself - Weber couldn’t you have assembled any of this prior to shipping? Grill looks great though and we’re excited to fire it up!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: My first gas grill, I've always been a charcoal BBQer. I love the ease and speed of getting grilling and not getting bathed in a smoke cloud on a windy evening. There are some things for which I still prefer charcoal, but I'm learning how to make most things come out well on this grill. And, as always, I love the quality of a Weber. The free, included assembly from Amazon was also a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: KathyF

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal / Professional Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Delivery right on time/Guys were very professional and had it assembled quickly. / Great deal and having it delivered and assembled made it all the more a value!
customer_reviews.author: scottmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years, this is my 2nd Weber. Assembly called for 2 people. One person can do it in about a hour. Works great. Three burners allow more flexibility in cooking than my old two burner. 😉 happy griller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weber spirit ii e310, gantastic
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived ahead of time. No damage. Assembly was easy. About 2 hours to put together. Hardware was of high quality. Grill is very high quality. It's a weber, says it all. I am going to try it out tonight. Extremely satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: too hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: got one and free set up from local hardware and grill store
customer_reviews.author: Annie Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love the heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: Been buying HD grills for the past 10 years and got tired of replacing them. I'm excited to experience the 10-year warranty of Weber and the craftmanship of a quality grill.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: nothing better than a Weber
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for me and my wife and even when the family comes. I replaced another Weber that lasted about 30 years and this one will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got the 3 burner.
customer_reviews.text: Well made as with all Weber Products ... except their covers. We had a larger Weber that lasted for years. My grandson is still using it. It regulates as well as most ovens.
customer_reviews.author: AMaines

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I grill with it about 4 times a week, and am very happy with it. The measure of how much propane is left in the tank is a bit hard to figure out, but still an improvement over others I've had. I also ordered assembly through Amazon, as I'm sick of putting together stuff like this on my own and am not terribly good ad it, so I'm very happy there, too. It did take this presumably experienced person a good hour, though.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Michel

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This thing has what feels like a million parts. It is also packed so tight that I had to slice open the whole box to get anything out. I haven't even started to build it and I know this is going to be a long day. The assembly guide is 35 pages long. Buy it assembled if you decide to buy it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift he loved it!! We love it and use it to bbq all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great grill. However, minus 1 star because one of the parts (the stand) is bent, we have to fix it in order to put it together. The assembly directions is easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: racteh

customer_reviews.title: Our Summer Cooking Treat
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect outdoor grill for the two of us. Easy for me to turn on, to control. We use it about every night in the summer. Also, we were absolutely thrilled that it came with a free assembly service. The technician was great and got us set up with no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this grill so far. I saw a few comments about it being difficult to assemble. There are "50 steps" but that is because the instructions are super simplified. I consider myself quite good at assembling items like this, I took my time, and it took about an hour to fully assemble. The grill itself works very well.
customer_reviews.author: tom brown

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My goodness what a great packing job! I was impressed. This grill is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: It's a Weber
customer_reviews.text: Assembly does take some time. It's best not to tighten all the screws until near completion. This will allow fitment and ease of assembly. I assembled it by myself and I am 73 - just use some common sense.
customer_reviews.author: TomG

product_meta.title: Weber 45010001 Spirit II E-310 3-Burner Liquid Propane Grill, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Liquid PropaneGet ready to step up your grilling experience. As the family sits down for dinner, or a couple of friends come over for a bite - This three burner grill will do its magic. With the spacious cooking area You can sear steaks on one side while grilling an appetizer on the other, & The convenient open-cart allows you to keep your tools & equipment within reach. Armed with the strong GS4 grilling system & grill 3 compatible (sold separately), This gas grill is sure to take you & your meals to the next level.
feature_bullets: Boasts the GS4 grilling system with improved infinity ignition, burners, porcelain-enameled Glamorizer Bars, and grease Management system
529 Square inches of cooking space over three burners. Left Table down width - 42 inches
30, 000 BTU-per-hour input main burners with fuel gauge
Open cart design with six tool hooks and two large wheels.Built-in lid thermometer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars905 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
